name: Shangri-La Hotel, Washington
description: Our largest room with a queen bed and foldable sofa. Comfortably fits 2-3 adults, four adults maximum. Decorated with Irish-themed colors and arts. It has a private bathroom with a shower, equipped with smart TV, mini-fridge, desk, chairs. Enjoy City views at the sitting area by the window. Located on the 3rd floor with no elevator.
